#Text=16. The Rebellion of the High Ki
#Text=The bold speech of Nerle 's made the two damsels laugh at the same time , and their sweet laughter sounded like rippling strains of harmonious music .
#Text=But the two Ki-Ki frowned angrily , and the two Ki looked at the boy in surprise , as if wondering at his temerity .
#Text=" Who are these strangers ? " asked the pretty High Ki , speaking together as all the twins of Twi did ; " and why are they not mates , but only half of each other ? "
#Text=" These questions , your Supreme Highnesses , " said the blond-haired pair of Ki-Ki , " we are unable to answer . "
#Text=" Perhaps , then , the strangers can answer themselves , " said the little maids , smiling first upon the Ki-Ki and then upon the prisoners .
#Text=Prince Marvel bowed .
#Text=" I am from the great outside world , " said he , " and my name is Prince Marvel .

#Text=For in the Land of Twi no person is complete or perfect without its other half , and it seems to take two of you to make one man -- or one maid .

_	_	_	_

#Text=The sweet faces of the twin High Ki grew thoughtful at this speech , and they said :

#Text= Indeed , it may be you are right .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Then , turning to the Ki , they asked :  Why have you brought these strangers here ? "

column1: #Text=" To ask your Supreme Highnesses to permit them to return again to the world from whence they came , " answered the Ki , both of them regarding their supreme rulers earnestly .
#Text=But here the Ki-Ki spoke up quickly in their mild voices , saying :
#Text=" That is not our idea , your Highnesses .
#Text=And the other twin High Ki said at the same instant :
#Text=" They shall NOT die ! "

#Text=Had twin thunderbolts fallen through the twin roofs of the twin palaces and struck the twin Ki and the twin Ki-Ki upon their twin heads it would have created no more stupendous a sensation than did this remark .
#Text=Never before had any two halves of a twin of the Land of Twi thought differently or spoken differently .

#Text=Indeed , it startled the two maidens themselves as much as it did their hearers , for each one turned her head toward the other and , for the first time in her life , looked into the other 's face !
#Text=This act was fully as strange as their speech , and a sudden horrible thought came into the startled heads of the twin Ki and the twin Ki-Ki :
#Text=THE HIGH KI OF TWI WAS NO LONGER ONE , BUT TWO .
#Text=AND THESE TWO WERE THINKING AND ACTING EACH INDEPENDENT OF THE OTHER !

#Text=It is no wonder the shock rendered them speechless for a time , and they stood swaying their four bodies , with their eight eyes bulging out like those of fishes and their four mouths wide open , as if the two pairs had become one quartet .
#Text=The faces of the two maids flushed as they gazed upon each other .
#Text=" How DARE you contradict me ? " asked one .
#Text=" How dare you contradict ME ? " demanded the other , and not only were these questions asked separately , but the accent on the words was different .
#Text=And their twin minds seemed to get farther apart every moment .
#Text=" I 'm the High Ki of Twi ! " said one .
#Text=" You 're not !
#Text=" They shall live ! " cried the other .
#Text=" My will is supreme . "
#Text=" It 's not !
